name: genome-properties-website
description: Website for the Genome Properties project

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rollup -c && cp node_modules/genome-properties-viewer/bin/* dist && cp node_modules/genome-properties-viewer/*.css dist/
scripts.serve: npm run rollup-watch & npm run browser-sync

author: Gustavo Salazar <gsalazar@ebi.ac.uk>
